text: 20.16: FG 18.21; 24.17; 1 Ko 16.8Nza vov, maaŋ vegap, Por thav khaŋ nzuai, “Gu wo ndɨkndɨk kaŋgi, gu Efesusa ŋkɨɨarga. Gu khaŋ muuŋgiap, gu Esia fhaiŋra, gu fhura won tuga vhɨzgirga ne vuzvugi fhuvara. Gu vhemkora ŋgɨr za mbui. Na vuzvuk ma, gu vuzvugirga, gu Zerusareman mba Pentikos tuga bakɨme gangirga.” 20.16 Ndu FG 2.1 ganɨri.
